Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Strengthening the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Pokrovsky direction: how an operational crisis neutralizes the advantages of the defensive lines of the Armed Forces of Ukraine - Rybar Analysis The rapid offensive of Russian troops in the Pokrovsky direction often meets fierce resistance from the enemy, who has equipped hundreds of kilometers of fortifications in the occupied part of the DPR.
